servlet.description: Servlet implementing the jk connector. Make sure 'load-on-startup' is set if you are using tomcat3.3 or 4.1. For 4.0 you must use JkServlet40.

init-param.description: Address to listen on. Default to WEB-INF/work/tomcatSocket for unix domain sockets and pipes and 8089 for TCP
Channel used for communication. Use org.apache.jk.common.ChannelUn for unix sockets, org.apache.jk.common.ChannelSocket for TCP. XXX multi-value, multiple channels ?
